page.title: 19Employment
page.content: There are{approximately 270 persons {of 18yrs}or over in the block, of which 75 are{retired,}9 are{unemployed and about 30 are{housewives}or {children. The main employment in the area is {farming and tourism}with most of the 55 locally employed engaged in the former. About 70 persons leave the area to work, and of the total in work, about 35 are{self-employed,}and 25 {part-time. The only employers in the blocks are farmers, pubs, hotels and builders. There are no large industries in or around Crowcombe.
